synopsis.text: Kuromi receives a photo of her missing older sister Romina, who she has not seen in some time. Desperate to reunite with Romina, Kuromi embarks on a worldwide journey to find her. Along the way, she gains loyal companions who support her quest. However, Kuromi also encounters dangerous evil organizations that stand in the way of her search. Though the road is perilous, Kuromi persists, driven by her sisterly devotion. New friends and foes emerge as she traces Romina's path across the globe. Will the sisters finally reunite? Kuromi's epic tale promises adventure, camaraderie, and peril.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
